content:
TITLE: RStan stanc Wrapper
DESCRIPTION: Provides an R-based wrapper for the Stan compiler (stanc). This allows users to compile Stan models directly from within the R environment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stan-dev/stan/blob/develop/RELEASE-NOTES.txt#_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: C++
CODE:
```
rstan/rstan/src/stanc.cpp
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: RStan R Interface
DESCRIPTION: Defines the primary R interface for interacting with Stan models. This file likely contains functions for compiling, running, and analyzing Stan models from within R.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stan-dev/stan/blob/develop/RELEASE-NOTES.txt#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: R
CODE:
```
rstan/rstan/R/rstan.R
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Generated C++ Source
DESCRIPTION: Represents generated C++ code from Stan models.  The YYY placeholder indicates the Stan model name and XXX the stan file name. This highlights the code generation process that translates Stan models into C++ for efficient execution.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stan-dev/stan/blob/develop/RELEASE-NOTES.txt#_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: C++
CODE:
```
rstan/rstan/src/YYY__XXX.cpp
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: RStan Core Classes
DESCRIPTION: Defines core classes related to Stan fits and arguments in C++ within the RStan package. These headers likely contain definitions for managing Stan model parameters and data within the R environment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stan-dev/stan/blob/develop/RELEASE-NOTES.txt#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: C++
CODE:
```
rstan/rstan/inst/include/rstan/stan_fit.hpp
rstan/rstan/inst/include/rstan/stan_args.hpp
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Stan Compiler (stanc) Command Line
DESCRIPTION: Implementation of the Stan compiler, stanc, as a command-line tool in C++.  This is the program responsible for translating Stan models into C++ code.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stan-dev/stan/blob/develop/RELEASE-NOTES.txt#_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: C++
CODE:
```
stan/command/stanc.cpp
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: RStan Chains Implementation
DESCRIPTION: Provides the R implementation for handling and processing MCMC chains generated by Stan. This includes functionalities for summarizing and visualizing the results.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stan-dev/stan/blob/develop/RELEASE-NOTES.txt#_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: C++
CODE:
```
rstan/rstan/src/chains.cpp
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: MCMC Chains Management
DESCRIPTION: Defines data structures and algorithms for managing MCMC chains within the Stan framework, crucial for analyzing the output of Stan models.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stan-dev/stan/blob/develop/RELEASE-NOTES.txt#_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: C++
CODE:
```
stan/mcmc/chains.hpp
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: RList Variable Context
DESCRIPTION: Provides an implementation for variable context using R lists, allowing Stan models to access data stored in R lists.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stan-dev/stan/blob/develop/RELEASE-NOTES.txt#_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: C++
CODE:
```
rstan/rstan/inst/include/rstan/io/rlist_ref_var_context.hpp
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: RStan Makefiles
DESCRIPTION: Specifies the build process for RStan using makefiles, including instructions for compiling C++ code and linking libraries. The .win extension indicates Windows-specific configurations.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stan-dev/stan/blob/develop/RELEASE-NOTES.txt#_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: Makefile
CODE:
```
rstan/rstan/src/Makefile{,.win}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: RStan Options Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Configures various options for RStan, such as specifying the versions of Boost and Eigen libraries used. This ensures compatibility and proper functioning of the RStan package.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stan-dev/stan/blob/develop/RELEASE-NOTES.txt#_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: R
CODE:
```
rstan/rstan/R/options.R
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: RStan Author List
DESCRIPTION: Lists the authors and contributors to the RStan package, providing credit and acknowledging their contributions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stan-dev/stan/blob/develop/RELEASE-NOTES.txt#_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: R
CODE:
```
rstan/rstan/DESCRIPTION
rstan/rstan/man/rstan.Rd
```
